sentences.english: In irrigated desert soil, the economic benefit of resin coated urea application was superior to that of urea;
sentences.chinese: 灌漠土上施用树脂包衣尿素的经济效益好于普通尿素。

sentences.english: In irrigated desert soil, the economic benefit of resin coated urea application was superior to that of urea;
sentences.chinese: 灌漠土上施用树脂包衣尿素的经济效益好于普通尿素。

sentences.english: Leboratory prepared cyclic ethylene urea was used in these experiments.
sentences.chinese: 在各项研究中均系采用实验室制备的环亚乙基尿素。

sentences.english: Urea isn't commonly found in agricultural fertilizers, but it is present in many garden products.
sentences.chinese: 尿素很少用于农业肥料，但是常常用作花肥。

sentences.english: Palygorskite coated urea can effectively improve the yield of spring wheat.
sentences.chinese: 坡缕石包衣尿素能有效促进春小麦增产。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the enrichment method of linoleic acid in sunflower oil.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选尿素包合法富集葵花油中亚油酸的方法。

sentences.english: Decanediamide was synthesized using sebacic acid and urea as starting materials.
sentences.chinese: 以癸二酸和尿素为原料合成癸二酰胺。

sentences.english: The activity of urease is sensitive to bronopol.
sentences.chinese: 尿素酶的活性对溴硝醇比较敏感。

sentences.english: After the renovation of the urea unit to enlarge its capacity, the prilling tower becomes the bottleneck in capacity increase.
sentences.chinese: 尿素生产装置扩能改造后，造粒塔成为扩产的瓶颈。

sentences.english: Urea naturally breaks down into ammonia in the water.
sentences.chinese: 尿素在水中会水解成氨。

sentences.english: The plant added carbamide as reducer into calciner continuously.
sentences.chinese: 该工厂使用尿素作为还原剂，向分解炉内连续加入。

sentences.english: This is an X-linked deficiency of one of the enzymes in the urea cycle.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个X染色体缺陷导致的尿素循环酶缺乏症之一。

sentences.english: Serum LDH isoenzymes seemed similar to synovial fluid LDH isoenzymes on the effect of urea inhibition.
sentences.chinese: 抗尿素作用，血清和滑液LDH同工酶基本相似。

sentences.english: The present invention is an improvement of dewaxing process of isopropanol and urea.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是对尿素异丙醇脱蜡过程的改进。

sentences.english: Results showed that urea was hydrolyzed fast with a high nitrification activity.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，潮土上尿素氮水解快，硝化活性较高。

sentences.english: A technological process is described for the manufacture of urea-based NPK compound fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了利用尿素制NPK尿基复合肥料生产工艺。

definition: sodium carbonate Na2CO3/soda ash/same as 碳酸鈉|碳酸钠
